title: A Measure of security
creator_contributor_role: United States Information Agency, production company
United States Information Agency, production company
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Public welfare - United States
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Welfare recipients
description: Documents the range and effectiveness of the U.S. Social Security system. It is the story of four people deriving supplemental incomes through old-age, disability, medicare and survivor benefits under the Social Security programme. All lead full and productive lives that might otherwise have been blighted by fear and poverty.
